sourcesContent:
import { StyledForm } from "./Form.js" import { Formik, Form as FormikForm, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik" import * as yup from "yup" const validationSchema = yup.object({ name: yup.string().required("Name is required").min(2, "Name is too short"), email: yup.string().required("Email is required").email("Email is invalid"), phone: yup .number("Invalid value") .required("Phone is required") .typeError("Invalid value") .positive("Invalid value"), }) export default function Form() { return ( { console.log(values) resetForm() }} validationSchema={validationSchema} >
) }
